text: visvasiccavare, ninnal sampadicca uttama ‎vastukkalilninnum ninnalkku nam bhumiyil ‎utpadippiccutannatil ninnum ninnal celavalikkuka. ‎kannataccukeantallate ninnalkku tanne ‎svikarikkanavatta citta vastukkal danam ‎ceyyanayi karutivekkarut. ariyuka: allahu ‎an'yasrayamillattavanum stutyarhanuman. ‎
